occurrences.context: ...gues in the Bible? It was always a known language. It was a known language. Every man heard them in Acts 2 in his own tongue. That's why they marveled.

...gues in the Bible? It was always a known language. It was a known language. Every man heard them in Acts 2 in his own tongue. That's why they marveled. How is it that all of us are hearing in our own tongue...
